page.title: 07Family Life
page.content: We interviewed sixteen people and they had a number of opinions about family life today. Generally, most people felt that there was not so much discipline in families today when compared with their own childhood. They felt that chidren also had too much freedom. The average number in each family was four and each family had at least one young child. All of the people interviewed lived in {Desborough}and had lived there between one month and forty three years. Most said that they had been attracted to this area by its good housing and job prospects. Two said that they found Desborough to be more social and friendly than their last place. Family entertainment consisted of going swimming,to parks, concerts,walking,and watching T.V.
